infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: CarDrop uses Bluetooth to discover nearby vehicles when you start scanning. This allows you to see cars that are physically near you at meets and events.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: CarDrop uses Bluetooth to discover nearby vehicles when you start scanning.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: CarDrop uses your location to automatically check you in to events when you arrive at the meet location. This is an optional premium feature that can be enabled in settings.
